coreAttributes.name: E832 Suit
coreAttributes.description: A cybernetically manufactured suit, for well behaving individuals.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the E832 Suit.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s E832 Suit and tear it off [npc.her] body.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your E832 Suit and roughly tear it off your body.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s E832 Suit and roughly tear it off from [npc2.her] body.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the E832 Suit.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the E832 Suit on [npc.name]'s body.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the E832 Suit onto [npc.her] body.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts the E832 Suit on you.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the E832 Suit onto your body.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts on the E832 Suit on [npc2.her] body.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the E832 Suit onto [npc2.her] body.

displacementText.playerSelf: You shift your E832 Suit to the side.
displacementText.playerNPC: You shift [npc.name]'s E832 Suit to the side.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s E832 Suit and shift it to the side.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] shifts [npc.her] E832 Suit to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] shifts your E832 Suit to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your E832 Suit and roughly shifts it to the side.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] shifts [npc2.name]'s E832 Suit to the side.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s E832 Suit and roughly shifts it to the side.

replacementText.playerSelf: You shift your E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.playerNPC: You shift [npc.name]'s E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.her] E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] shifts her E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] shifts your E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces your E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] shifts [npc2.name]'s E832 Suit back into place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly shifts [npc2.name]'s E832 Suit back into place.
